name: Slow Cooker Turkey and Vegetable Soup
author: Shanelle
summary: Delicious slow cooker vegetable soup with ground turkey and lentils. Very earthy and hearty. Serve alone or with homemade bread for a delicious fall meal.
ingredients: 4 cups water, or more to taste
2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with juice
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir ground turkey in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Add onion and saute until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes
Add 4 cups water, diced tomatoes with juice, potatoes, carrots, bell pepper, celery, lentils, broccoli, frozen corn, molasses, bay leaves, bouillon cubes, basil, salt, and pepper
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours or on High for 5 to 6 hours, adding up to 2 cups more water depending on how thick you want the soup
